title: ** Login to the Secure Area
preconditions: User has a valid username and password
main_flow: User navigates to the login page at https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login
5. If credentials are valid, the user is redirected to the secure area
If the user enters invalid credentials, the system displays an error message
If the user forgets their password, they can click on the "Forgot Password" link to reset their password
postconditions: User has access to the secure area
User can logout from the secure area
